statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customer_data ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC, age ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM customer_data WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, preferences FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND JSON_LENGTH(preferences) > 0
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_history FROM customer_data WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, recommendation_text FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, recommendation_date FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id WHERE recommendation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT email, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT customer_id, name, amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) FROM Recommendations GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT Customers.customer_id, Customers.name, PurchaseHistory.product_id FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM Recommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_recommendations > 2;
SELECT Customers.name, Recommendations.recommendation_date FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Recommendations ON Customers.customer_id = Recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, product_name, rating FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT full_name, total_amount, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customers.full_name, products.product_name, purchases.quantity FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;
